about_the_game:
“Come down to Bots & Mods. The first stop for all your robotics needs.”

Take over and run a workshop in the city of Danopolis. Build components to craft custom designed robots. Sell them or keep them to help manage your busy workshop. Keep an eye on market fluctuations and don't forget to meet the locals and get to know their stories.
Gather your resources below the city or in the augmented reality around you, to be able to craft what you need.

Join the discord community:

Features:


  • Design and craft custom robots to meet your or the customers specific needs. Not all robots will be the same. Pick and choose components and assemble unique robots.



  • Automate your robots do the the dirty work for you




  • Maximise your profits by setting prices you want. Random events will cause demand to fluctuate. Building robots is hard and you should be compensated accordingly




  • Gather resources in the depth below the city and in the digitally augmented world around you. Enter AR to collect data resources and use it to for your AIs and robot blueprints

  • Meet the locals of Danopolis and fulfil their demands
